coaches.name: Dr. Sarah Chen
coaches.title: Tech Leadership Coach
coaches.description: Empowering tech leaders to build and scale high-performing teams
coaches.detailedDescription: Former CTO turned leadership coach with 15+ years of experience in scaling engineering teams. Expert in helping technical leaders develop their management skills and build effective teams.
credentials: Ph.D. in Computer Science, Stanford University

sessionTypes.description: Personal coaching session focused on your specific challenges and goals
Deep dive into specific challenges with actionable strategy planning

packages.name: Leadership Transition
packages.description: Comprehensive support for new engineering leaders

testimonials.text: Dr. Chen helped me transition from senior engineer to engineering director smoothly. Her insights were invaluable.

coaches.name: Marcus Thompson
coaches.title: Product Innovation Coach
coaches.description: Guiding product leaders to create game-changing solutions
coaches.detailedDescription: Former Head of Product at leading tech companies with expertise in product strategy and innovation. Specializes in helping teams develop user-centric products and drive market growth.

sessionTypes.description: Strategic session focused on product vision and roadmap
Interactive workshop for product teams to spark innovation

testimonials.text: Marcus transformed our product development process. His insights led to a successful product launch.

coaches.name: Dr. Rebecca Martinez
coaches.title: Data Science Leadership Coach
coaches.description: Building exceptional data science teams and leaders
coaches.detailedDescription: Distinguished data scientist and leader with expertise in building and scaling data science teams. Focuses on developing technical leadership and data-driven decision making.
credentials: Former Head of Data Science at DataCorp

sessionTypes.description: Focused coaching on data team leadership and strategy
Deep dive into technical challenges and architecture

packages.name: Data Science Leadership
packages.description: Comprehensive program for data science leaders

testimonials.text: Dr. Martinez helped me transition from senior data scientist to leading a team of 15.

coaches.name: James Wilson
coaches.title: Agile Transformation Coach
coaches.detailedDescription: Seasoned agile coach with experience in enterprise-wide transformations. Expert in scaling agile practices and building high-performing teams.

sessionTypes.description: One-on-one coaching for agile practitioners and leaders
Comprehensive team evaluation and improvement planning

testimonials.text: James helped our organization successfully transition to SAFe, improving delivery predictability by 40%.

coaches.name: Elena Petrova
coaches.title: UX Design Leadership Coach
coaches.description: Elevating design teams and leaders to create exceptional experiences
coaches.detailedDescription: Award-winning UX leader with experience building design teams at scale. Specializes in design operations and leadership development.

sessionTypes.description: Strategic coaching for design leaders and managers
In-depth review of team portfolio and processes

testimonials.text: Elena's guidance helped me scale our design team from 5 to 25 while maintaining quality and culture.
